body_html:
@soumith , do you have any idea why this happens? I've pulled the newest torch version today and I'm getting the same error. Interestingly, even when I checkout to v0.2.0, I still can't import torch.

@Pavel-Akapian
As a workaround, you can do
LD_PRELOAD=/usr/lib/libmpi_cxx.so python, it should help.
